Bash, an Adium message style 30/10/2009

I made this because I always disliked those happy IM windows, with things bouncing around making weird sound effects. It was intially much simpler than this, but a fancy terminal is still good, as long as it is fast, right? My friends Caffo, Taiza and Juca helped me with this since the beginning, and there is even a Variant (color style) made by Caffo that is in the package -  bu noone likes it. I've heard that this might work on pidgin too, can someone confirm this? If not what changes do I need to make so this can work? [caption id="attachment_155" align="alignleft" width="329" caption="a sample message"][/caption] I plan to only update this to fix bugs now, but if you have any ideas, suggestions or requests, just let me know. To get this you can go to the Adium Xtras page, or you can get it straight from GitHub, where you can find more versions as well.
